text:
Search is on to locate two persons who went missing while trying to cross the River Cauvery in Paramathi Velur here on Thursday.

A 45-year-old man along with a 10-year-old boy tried to cross the river near Kondalam. However, people in the river bank warned them not to cross the river as the water level is high. But, the two unidentified persons attempted to cross the river and were missing. Fire and Rescue Service personnel searched for them. But, the personnel are yet to locate them. It is unclear whether they attempted suicide or washed away while crossing the river.
title: Search continues
